articles.author: IANS
articles.title: Australian Open: Sania Mirza-Rajeev Ram Advance to Mixed Doubles Quarters - The Quint
articles.description: India's Sania Mirza and her American partner Rajeev Ram advanced to the quarterfinals of the 2022 Australian Open mixed doubles event after beating Australia's Ellen Perez and Matwe Middelkoop of the Netherlands, on Sunday.
